1090830.name: Fantasy Grounds - Stranger Things Dungeons & Dragons Starter Set
1090830.description:
Stranger Things Dungeons & Dragons Starter Set

The
Stranger Things Dungeons & Dragons Starter Set contains everything players need to embark on a
Stranger Things adventure including the essential rules of the roleplaying game. It's a great way for new as well as seasoned Dungeon & Dragons players to experience the D&D adventure
Stranger Things character Mike Wheeler has created for his friends.
Pick your character--will you be Will the Wise or Dustin the Dwarf? Get your
fireballs ready as you investigate the mysterious castle and battle the ferocious Demogorgon. Prepare for just about anything, because the game just got stranger.
Includes:
  • Stranger Things Adventure book
  • Rulebook
  • 5 Stranger Things pregens
  • Demogorgon and other tokens
  • Fantasy Grounds automation
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Zacchaeus
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
